description:
[center][size=6][b][color=#4a90e2]Introducing: Quill Rich Text Editor[/color][/b][/size][/center]

Elevate your app's user experience by empowering them to craft and fine-tune rich text content, directly within your application.

[b]Quill[/b]: A cutting-edge WYSIWYG editor designed for today's web, brought seamlessly into bubble¬†through our plugin.

With its [b]contemporary design[/b] and [b]adaptable toolbar options[/b], the Quill plugin delivers a blend of style and flexibility. Beyond its aesthetic charm, it's loaded with actions, events, and dynamic functionalities:

[center][url=https://data-visualization-plotly.bubbleapps.io/version-test/quill-rich-text-editor?ref=mrkt][color=#0000ff][size=4]üåê Experience Quill - Live Demo & Editor[/size][/color][/url][/center]
[center]
[hr]

[/center]
[left][color=#808080][size=4]Features & Functions[/size][/color][/left]

[b][color=#808080]Actions:[/color][/b]
Unlock powerful functionalities via workflows:
[ul]
[li][b]Delete Text:[/b] Clear specific parts of the text.[/li]
[li][b]Set Text:[/b] Determine the editor's textual content.[/li]
[li][b]Insert Text:[/b] Introduce new text at a particular point.[/li]
[li][b]Set Contents & Update Contents:[/b] Manage the entirety of the editor‚Äôs content, with special handling for Quill Formatting.[/li]
[li][b]Insert Embed:[/b] Integrate embedded materials like videos or images.[/li]
[li][b]Insert HTML:[/b] Add raw HTML content directly.[/li]
[li][b]Blur & Focus:[/b] Control the editor's attention point.[/li]
[li][b]Enable:[/b] Switch the editor on or off as needed.[/li]
[li][b]Set Selection:[/b] Highlight specific text segments.[/li]
[/ul]

[b][color=#808080]States:[/color][/b]
Fetch essential details on-demand:
[ul]
[li][b]Contents:[/b] Access the editor's content with Quill formatting.[/li]
[li][b]Length:[/b] Know the extent of the content.[/li]
[li][b]Text:[/b] Retrieve the editor's plain text.[/li]
[li][b]Format & Selection:[/b] Understand the formatting and user's current selection.[/li]
[/ul]

[b][color=#808080]Triggers:[/color][/b]
React based on user activity:
[ul]
[li][b]text-change:[/b] Act when content alterations occur.[/li]
[li][b]selection-change:[/b] Respond to changes in text selection.[/li]
[/ul]

[center][url=https://forum.bubble.io/t/new-free-plugin-quill-rich-text-editor-plugin-for-bubble/253239][color=#0000ff][size=4]Dive Deeper in the Forum Post![/size][/color][/url][/center]

Your feedback propels us forward. Stay tuned for updates, and for any queries or suggestions, drop us a message. We're here to assist swiftly!
